templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/drinkleilo/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/drinkleilo

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: We don't offer phone support right now but I'd be happy to help you over text, let me know what I can do for you!

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can find us at a store near you here: https://leilo.com/pages/find-us

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! You can apply for our Calmbassador program here: https://leilo.com/pages/collab

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: I can check if that's possible. What's the order number, email address and the change you'd like to make?

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: We do not accept returns of Leilo due to beverage safety regulations. That being said, if there is any issue with your order we are here to help and will make things right. You can check out our return policy here: https://leilo.com/pages/return-policy

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $55. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content:
Thank you for your interest! Please note that order minimums start at cases of 72 cans. The wholesale application is very basic; it requires basic proof of business via EIN Numbers. 

For any wholesale questions please email us at sales@leilo.com. Our team is happy to chat!
